posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
What do you say folks, i think we deserve a search engine here since the number of builds has grown exponentially the last months.

Alas, i do not have the knowledge to do that myself or i would do it without a second thought.

So i am asking, what are your thoughts on that, and is it possible to do that at all?

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
I would love to see it, but like you I lack the tools. Does anyone step up?

Take it EZ!
